caption.center: COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, DEPARTMENT OF HIGHWAYS, v. Oliver JENKINS et al.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Johnson County; W.D. Sparks, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Jo M. Ferguson, Atty. Gen., F.D. Curry, Chief Asst. Atty. Gen., James J. Shannon, Jr., Department of Highways, Richmond, for appellant.
J.K. Wells, Wells Wells, Paintsville, for appellee.Page 442
opinion.opinion_text:
This case, involving damage to land, is before us on motion for an appeal under KRS 21.080.
The motion for an appeal is overruled and the judgment is affirmed.
